title: BF 1942 + several expansions & mods
description:
Weel, here i put BF1942 complete, with expansions; Vietnam, Secret Weaponds, Road To Rome, Eve Of Destruction, BF 1918, Desert Combat and Forgotten Hope.

My intention is make a easy way to obtain this files, because is hard to know how you must download and install all for a lot of people.

Seed!.
